 1998-04081998-03-190,  LAB,  ,  , 
PrecisONTARIO HYDRO NUCLEAR FACILITIES EXCLUSION FROM PART II OF THE CANADA LABOUR CODE REGULATIONS (OCCUPATIONAL HEALTH AND SAFETY) which allow the Government of Ontario, through an agreement with the federal government, to administer and enforce provincial labour laws with respect to Ontario Hydro nuclear facilities employees, as of April 1, 1998.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1998-0180 Publication Date: 1998-04-01
Attachments
precis:
ONTARIO HYDRO NUCLEAR FACILITIES EXCLUSION FROM PART II OF THE CANADA
LABOUR CODE REGULATIONS (OCCUPATIONAL HEALTH AND SAFETY) which allow the
Government of Ontario, through an agreement with the federal government, to
administer and enforce provincial labour laws with respect to Ontario Hydro
nuclear facilities employees, as of April 1, 1998.
